author: Rob Gilles / AP
title: Nova Scotia Mass Shooting Death Tool Rises to 22 as Police Find Victims in 5 Communities
description: There were 16 crime scenes in five different communities in northern and central Nova Scotia, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police said.
content:
(TORONTO) — Canadian police said Tuesday they believe there are at least 22 victims after a gunman wearing a police uniform shot people in their homes and set fires in a rampage across rural communities in Nova Scotia over the weekend.
